Installation
============
This page shows how to install pyxkcd.

Requirements
------------
pyxkcd requires Python 3.6 or later. Lower versions such as Python 3.5 may work, but are not tested.

Installation
------------
To install pyxkcd, the simplest way is to run the following command in your terminal:

.. code:: bash

    $ python3 -m pip install pyxkcd

On Windows, if the above command does not work, try:

.. code:: bash

    $ py -3 -m pip install pyxkcd

Alternatively, you can install from source, however is not recommended (unstable):

.. code:: bash

    $ pip install git+https://github.com/SomeHybrid/pyxkcd.git
